    • Constructor Detail

      • CoxeterGroup

        public CoxeterGroup(int[] perm)
        All Coxeter groups have a permutation in one of their representations. This * constructs a group based on that.
        Parameters:
        perm - the permutation in the permutation representation of the group.

      • CoxeterGroup

        public CoxeterGroup(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> word,
                    int n)
        All Coxeter groups can be represented by a word consisting of their generators. These word representations have many nice properties.
        Parameters:
        word - The list of generators.
        n - The number of generators.

      • CoxeterGroup

        public CoxeterGroup(int[] lehmer,
                    int n)
        Constructs an element based upon its Lehmer code.
        Parameters:
        lehmer - the Lehmer code
        n - just here to differentiate it from the permutation representationn.

      • getDescents

        public boolean[] getDescents()
        Returns the descent set of a permutation. A descent at i exists iff the i-1th generator increases the word length and the ith generator decreases it.
        Returns:
        a boolean array showing where the descents are
